channel.title: Rain splashes in Source
channel.description:
Is it possible to get a similar effect like the rain splahes from L4D into any other Orangebox Source game, like Episode 2?
And what have to be done for that? Just creating a new particle effect?
I also read this on VDC: [url]https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Rain_splashes[/url]
It says, to get the default splashes working on other surfaces than water would reqiure changing the source code. Are there ways to get it done, without programming? By just creating a new rain splash particle effect for example?
Thanks for help!
